title: Interpretation of running or jogging in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of running or running in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams is a science and a specialty that requires study and knowledge. There is a difference between a vision and a dream. Dreams do not find cohesion or harmony between them, but rather a group of contradictions, confusion and ambiguity. It is good news from God Almighty, which means that it can happen in the near future if it is interpreted correctly, and for this we find the interpretation of jogging or running in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of jogging or running in a dream for a single woman Jogging or running is a sport that humans have practiced since ancient times and one of its most important benefits That the body becomes harmonious and integrated, in addition to burning fat and other great benefits, in addition to the presence of elements in the dream that can be identified through the explanation of Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, as we will attach to you the interpretation of running in a dream for an unmarried woman as follows: Single people’s desire for self-realization Or reaching the desired goal. Also, her career or life is free of hardship or difficulty. In addition, she must be ambitious and strive to achieve her goals. See also: Interpretation of a dream about eating cooked meat for a pregnant woman in a dream Interpretation of a dream about running or jogging in a dream for a woman Married: The dream of running or jogging in a dream for a married woman indicates fear, anxiety, some stumbling in life, and financial problems at home. Also, among dream scholars, there are many indications that the dream of running or jogging in a dream indicates for a married woman, and we mention some of the connotations, including: If a married woman dreams that she is running or jogging, this indicates the illness of a family member. As well as increased fears and some psychological pressures. Moreover, if a married woman sees herself running or jogging in a dream that she is competing in a running race, this indicates her ambition to Obtaining money and livelihood. See also: Interpretation of a dream about buying children’s clothes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about escaping from someone. The dream of running is very important in a person’s life because the dream touches reality, according to the meanings of dream scholars, and it is one of the dreams that sticks in the mind and cannot be forgotten because of it. Escaping from someone What is in a dream indicates the problems that surround him, and escaping from it is evidence of complete rejection of these problems and judgments. Also, dreaming of escaping or running in a dream is evidence that someone is chasing you. But if the dreamer hears the sound of his breathing in the dream because of running, this means that problems will remain. For a long time and then you will get rid of it. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see a cut golden earring in a dream Interpretation of a dream about running or jogging in the darkDreams can be delayed in their fulfillment, appearance, and appearance, and this is because the science of dreams was not based on any basis that the dreamer could know or follow, so we will be With you in this article to explain the dream of running or jogging in the dark as follows: Running in the dark is a sign of loneliness that the dreamer will suffer from in the near future. It is also one of the signs that indicate problems and sadness that the dreamer may feel soon. Also, seeing a dream about running Or running

title: Interpretation of seeing bullets in a dream and its meaning according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of a bullet in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing a bullet in a dream indicates aggression and anger. Seeing a bullet in a dream can be a warning sign for the dreamer about something that will happen to him in the future and he needs to be vigilant. The ball in the dream can be an expression of The energy hidden within the dreamer. And if you see that in a dream people are being shot, this shows the extent of the difficulties that you will face in the future and the inability to confront them. Interpretation of seeing bullets in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees bullets in a dream indicates the extent of sadness, grief, and turmoil that she suffers from in her life. Marital. Driving in a married woman’s dream leads to a problem and strife between her and her husband. Shooting in a dream is a warning sign for the dreamer to hear bad news. Interpretation of hearing the sound of bullets in a dream. The sound of bullets in a dream is a warning sign for the dreamer that he will lose his job. And the merchant who hears the sound of bullets in The dream shows the extent of his poor management of trade and his exposure to loss. The sound of bullets in a married man’s dream indicates problems and quarrels between him and his wife. There are those who interpreted hearing the sound of bullets in a married woman’s dream as evidence of the many problems and quarrels between her and her husband that she will have to solve. Interpretation of a vision A gun in a dream Seeing a gun in a dream is a dream that does not indicate good luck, it indicates bad luck and bad news. Owning a gun in a dream indicates bad behavior of the dreamer. Hearing the sound of a gun in a dream indicates that there are people who pursue the interests of the dreamer and seek to Destroying it. We see the dreamer in the middle of a group of people and carrying a gun. He is peaceful and does not carry a weapon, which indicates his high status and standing among the people. Seeing the dreamer shooting another person means victory over the enemy. Interpretation of seeing bullets hitting Whoever sees in a dream that he is hitting people with bullets, then That dreamer carries some bad qualities such as envy, hatred, and jealousy of others. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible explanations about seeing bullets in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we receive your comments at the bottom of the article through the content website and we will provide you with the explanation as quickly as possible. .

title: Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Dreaming of heavy rain in a dream. Interpretation of dreams. Heavy rain in a dream. It indicates a lot of sustenance and forgiveness of sins. As for seeing a dream about rain, it is an indication of good condition and good morals. As for seeing heavy rain falling in the summer, this indicates illness and is one of the unpleasant visions. A dream about washing from rainwater is evidence. On the justice of the world and religion. The dream of heavy rain in the dream of an unmarried Al-Osaimi woman. The dream of heavy rain in the dream of a single girl is evidence of a new love story that will succeed. As for seeing rain and hearing thunder and lightning, it is a sign that you are going through some difficult situations and problems. If he sees some rain in a dream, this A sign that he hears happy words. A dream about a girl walking in the rain is a sign of a new job or an upcoming marriage. Bathing in the rain in a dream is an indication that she is protecting herself and her honor. A detailed interpretation of a dream about heavy rain: Seeing someone in a dream striking someone known to him, and this indicates The benefit that he will receive in the near future and it may be marriage. If one sees in a dream rain falling abundantly from the window, this indicates the security in which one lives. If someone dreams in a dream that rain is falling abundantly, but it does not harm anyone, this indicates Many good things happen in the dreamer's life. Heavy rain can also indicate that God will answer the prayer urged by the dreamer. Dreaming of light rain in a dream can be an indication of happy events or finding a new job. As for seeing rain falling on the ground Desolate, it indicates wealth and goodness. As for visions of heavy rain, such as torrential rain, this indicates torment and destruction. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the social situation in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Basmala in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Basmala in a dream through the interpretation books of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, or Ibn Shaheen Interpretation of a dream about the Basmala for a single, married, or pregnant woman from the Fekra website The Basmala is in the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful, and it is the key to the Qur’an. The Basmala is the first thing written on the Preserved Tablet and the first thing Gabriel, peace be upon him, wrote. The Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, recited the supplication of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. It has been reported that there is no good in a matter that does not begin with the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. The Basmala in a dream indicates goodness and blessing in various matters of life, blessing in marriage and children, increased nutrition, peace, and reassurance. We will explain it in detail. A dream is a dream, and this is on the moments site. Saying Bismillah in a dream for an unmarried woman and saying Bismillah in a dream indicates guidance, faith and obedience to God, because it indicates the blessing of time, money, life and guardianship from God. For an unmarried girl, Basmala indicates her marriage, psychological stability, the righteousness of her religion, and the strength of her faith. Interpretation of a dream after Basmala in a dream Basmala is pronounced at the beginning of actions and means blessing in something and success in various matters of life, and repeating Basmala indicates guidance, faith, love of obedience and protection from Satan. Interpretation of a dream of singing Basmala and repeating Basmala indicates the blessing of money and children, and the answer to supplication as it indicates the completion of matters. Interpretation of a dream of Basmala in jeans Basmala on the jinn indicates the strength of the owner of the vision of faith, and the jinn in a dream are deceivers with deception and conspiracies. Interpretation of a dream of Basmala in jeans Writing Basmala, whether it is Bismillah or Bismillah Al-Rahman Al-Raheem, indicates God’s care and the safety and security of the dreamer. If Bismillah is written on the wall in silver or gold with its repetition The dreamer This indicates an abundance of goodness and great blue and reading it in the painful jinn is evidence of the death of the dreamer. For crises and difficult situations, and challenging obstacles, but also for victory over his enemies. Interpretation of a dream of Basmala for a single woman If the Basmala in a dream is written on paper or on the walls in beautiful handwriting, this indicates the dreamer's guidance in this language or someone sends him an amount of money and Basmala in all cases is good for a man, a woman and an unmarried girl Basmala indicates her marriage to a righteous husband who takes care of her affairs and protects her. Interpretation of a dream of singing Basmala Basmala is one of the first verses of the Qur’an and the first surahs of the Holy Qur’an, and it must be read at the beginning of every surah except Surat At-Tawbah. It is also said at the beginning of eating so that Satan does not eat with the person, and it is also said at the beginning of any work to ward off Satan and the blessing of this work. Writing it down and repeating it in dreams indicates justice, piety and the good result of the vision. And Basmala for a married woman is safety and fear of worries and sorrows. This dream for young men and for men indicates good form and the establishment of livelihood, money and happiness in this world And the hereafter. It also indicates the young man’s legal marriage and immunity from Satan and lust.

This dream for young men and for men indicates good form and the establishment of livelihood, money and happiness in this world And the hereafter. title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband drowning in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a husband drowning in a dream: The dreams that we see in a dream are among the natural things that happen to the teeth, as we may find that there are many people who may dream realistic dreams from the reality in which they live, and on the other hand, we can see dreams that have no relationship to the reality in which It is present in it, as it is considered imaginary dreams, and these dreams are difficult or impossible to achieve in reality. Interpretation of a dream of a husband drowning in a dream Drowning is considered one of the most difficult and dangerous things that a person can be exposed to, as it can lead to the person’s immediate death, while Interpretation of a dream of a husband drowning in a dream You can Bringing this evidence to the viewer: This can be considered evidence that this husband is committing many sins and transgressions. It is also a sign of his distance from God and his religious duties. While when he saw that he drowned the person in his sleep, but he was not harmed, he considered this a sign of his victory. On many achievements in his life. However, when a person can be saved from drowning, this is a sign of the fortuneteller’s love for helping others. In the case of seeing drowning and dying because of this, this indicates that the dreamer is immersed in sins. While drowning in high sea waves, this is a sign of The troubles and trials that the fortuneteller will go through. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the appearance of menstrual blood or the menstrual cycle according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing someone drowning in a dream. It is possible to see many cases of drowning while you are on the beach, as a result of not knowing how to swim or the height of the sea waves while seeing someone drowning in a dream is one of the signs. The following: This dream indicates that the person is immersed in worries and problems. When the dreamer sees his beloved drowning, this indicates that he will go through many hardships and crises, and God knows best. However, if a person drowns in pure water, this is a sign of drowning in worldly pleasures. If The dreamer is sick and sees himself drowning in a dream, this is one of the signs of his death in one of his relatives. While seeing a man drowning while he is not alive, this is a sign of his bad condition in the afterlife. Also, if an infidel sees himself drowning, it is a sign of his repentance and entry into the Islamic religion. It is worth noting that seeing a child drowning in a dream is a sign of worry and anxiety that fills the dreamer’s life. However, when an unmarried girl sees the child drowning, this indicates that he will be a reason for happiness in her family. It is also stated in the interpretation of the drowning child that the dreamer will help many of those around him See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a selfie in a dream from the most famous scholars of complete interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about my beloved drowning in a dream. We may see dreams and after that we feel worried about the interpretation they may bring, while there are dreams that may be undesirable, but they convey good news to the dreamer. And a dream about my beloved drowning in a dream. The dream presented with these interpretations: It can be considered a sign that he is drowning in many worries and problems in his life. It is also a sign that he is drowning in financial crises and heartaches. It can also be a sign that the visionary may...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing green plants in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream of a vast green land in the dream of an unmarried girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. A dream of a farm and a dream of plowed land. Interpretation of a dream about agriculture, green lands, and plants. With the diversity of dreams and their different interpretations, we find among them what is positive or negative. The meanings of dreams affect the dreamer as well as his private life. Based on this topic, the dreamer seeks to know What his dreams hide for him and today we are among the various dreams that we have chosen for you through this article from the site Femininity Interpretation of Green Land in a dream. The green plant is one of the common dreams that many people have at any time, but its importance is still unknown to to a big limit. This is what the Femininity website seeks to discover today through this article, which is at your disposal to understand what are the most prominent meanings carried by the interpretation of a dream about a green plant. Whoever sees in his dream that he is planting green plants in front of his house and in the garden near it, this is a sign that he will perform many of the tasks assigned to him. Which can contribute to his prosperity and success. Whoever dreams during his sleep that he is harvesting green plants at a different time, this is a sign that he will be exposed to a disease or an important problem that he may not be able to solve easily. And if a person dreams that the garden in front of him, planted with green plants, has dried up or been plowed, then this indicates However, many good things will come to him and he will enjoy many good and good things. Whoever sees in his dream that he is picking the green plant in front of him, this indicates a good and good woman that he will meet or associate with in his emotional and family life. In the event that one dreams that something If he injures a green plant and causes it to lose, wilt, or wilt, then this is a sign that upcoming problems await him in the coming period, which he must quickly solve. Whoever sees in a dream that a green plant has been burned or cut down, this indicates that some of those around him are planning For evil and they want to harm him or his family members. The green land in a dream is considered negative harm for whoever sees it, and in some dreams we may see a dead person in a dream on green land, and this is evidence that this dead person is in heaven. Green land denotes the world and its adornment and a good wife in which the husband finds a lot of goodness, and it is also a lot of money. Green land in a dream is an example of knowledge and wisdom for the dreamer, and whoever sees himself in the middle of green land in a dream eating what was planted in it, this indicates that he He will go to Hajj. Whoever sees in his dream green land that belongs to other people, this indicates that the dreamer wants to sit with the righteous. If the dreamer has green land in the dream, this is evidence that he will marry and have a son or will have a partner in life. If the green land trembles in the dream, then the subject indicates the birth of a pregnant woman, and if the person leaves green land, the subject indicates that he will travel to another place. Farmland in a dream is evidence of keeping secrets and security after fear, and wealth for the dreamer after poverty and gaining a position.

Whoever dreams during his sleep that he is harvesting green plants at a different time, this is a sign that he will be exposed to a disease or an important problem that he may not be able to solve easily. And if a person dreams that the garden in front of him, planted with green plants, has dried up or been plowed, then this indicates However, many good things will come to him and he will enjoy many good and good things. Whoever sees in his dream that he is picking the green plant in front of him, this indicates a good and good woman that he will meet or associate with in his emotional and family life. In the event that one dreams that something If he injures a green plant and causes it to lose, wilt, or wilt, then this is a sign that upcoming problems await him in the coming period, which he must quickly solve. Whoever sees in a dream that a green plant has been burned or cut down, this indicates that some of those around him are planning For evil and they want to harm him or his family members. The green land in a dream is considered negative harm for whoever sees it, and in some dreams we may see a dead person in a dream on green land, and this is evidence that this dead person is in heaven. Green land denotes the world and its adornment and a good wife in which the husband finds a lot of goodness, and it is also a lot of money. Green land in a dream is an example of knowledge and wisdom for the dreamer, and whoever sees himself in the middle of green land in a dream eating what was planted in it, this indicates that he He will go to Hajj. Whoever sees in his dream green land that belongs to other people, this indicates that the dreamer wants to sit with the righteous. If the dreamer has green land in the dream, this is evidence that he will marry and have a son or will have a partner in life. If the green land trembles in the dream, then the subject indicates the birth of a pregnant woman, and if the person leaves green land, the subject indicates that he will travel to another place. Farmland in a dream is evidence of keeping secrets and security after fear, and wealth for the dreamer after poverty and gaining a position.

title: Interpretation of seeing a court in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the court in a dream: This vision has many implications, since the court actually indicates justice, this vision has many meanings and positive connotations. We will try to locate most of them to the most important dream interpretation scholars, but as our site always emphasizes, we should not conclude from the interpretations that even If there is a similarity between the reader’s vision and the vision we will present, because the interpretation of visions does not depend only on the details that the dreamer sees, but rather depends on many other factors such as. Some circumstances related to the dream, which the dream interpreter must know in order to interpret the dream correctly. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the court in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the court in a dream. Ibn Sirin, who is considered one of the most important scholars of dream interpretation, says that the court and justice in a dream appear The dreamer's desire to achieve justice between people in reality and God knows best. Also, when you dream of discussing matters in court, it can be a sign of issues related to conscience and morality. Ibn Shirin also says that court in a dream can be a sign of pollution or loss of money. In addition, the court in a dream can be a sign of important decisions that the dreamer will make. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing the court in a dream for a man When a man dreams of the court in a dream, this is one of the indicators of disputes and disagreements that this person suffers from in life. Seeing the court in A dream about a patient: When a patient sees the court in a dream and there is a decision in his favor, this is good news for that patient that he will recover - God willing - from the disease. But if the patient dreams of the issuance of a ruling, this may be an indication that he will not recover, according to God’s will, and God knows best. Read Also: Penguin in a dream Seeing a summons to court in a dream When you dream that you will be summoned to court in the end, this may be an indication of the problems that the dreamer will fall into, and God knows best. Also, being summoned to court in a dream may be an indication that the dreamer is facing some difficulties at work, and God knows best. I know. As for an unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she has been summoned to court, this indicates that this girl is facing some obstacles and difficulties. Seeing a judge in a dream When she dreams of a judge, this may be a sign of rivalry, just as the justice of a judge for someone in court in a dream indicates That person’s victory. Also, a judge in a dream can be based on signs and symbols of justice and fairness. In addition, seeing a judge in a dream indicates success and success - God willing - in life. Also, a judge at home in a dream shows the abundant blessings and goodness that he enjoys. This is the judge. As for shaking hands with the judge in the dream, this indicates the belief in God’s justice that the dreamer has. title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a fire in a dream for a married woman from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about a fire in the house for a married woman

preview.html: Seeing fire in a dream for a married woman. Is seeing fire for a married woman good or bad? What are the negative interpretations of a dream about fire? What does burning clothes in a dream portend? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin and leading interpretation scholars. Seeing fire in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a married woman shows that she is trying to change many things in her life and is trying with all her might to make a bright future for herself. . Problems. Commentators said that a dream of burning fires for a married woman is evidence of her failure to fulfill her duties towards her religion, and the necessity of regular prayer, performance of religious duties, and repentance to God Almighty. You will enjoy it soon. If the dreamer sees a fire and does not try to put it out, this symbolizes that she will soon break her relationship with a malicious friend and will be happy and reassured in her life. If a married woman sees a fire in her house, this indicates that her partner will rise to his job and reach the highest positions in the coming tomorrow. It is said that seeing demons in the form of fire indicates that the dreamer is suffering from witchcraft and envy and should ask the Lord (Almighty) to remove the harm from them and recite the Holy Qur’an and legal ruqyah. Soon she will marry a kind and kind-hearted person. Seeing fire in a dream for a married woman in Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing fire in a married woman’s dream as an indication of the disputes she is currently experiencing with her partner, which will end after some time. If the dreamer is burned by fire in Her dream, this symbolizes that she committed a great sin in the past and fears the punishment of God Almighty in the future, if the dreamer does not give birth. Before and saw fire in her dream, she has good news of her pregnancy almost and the Lord (the Mighty and Most High) is Most High and Most Knowing. Ibn Sirin said that a dream about fire without smoke is a sign of the many funds that a married woman and her family will soon have. title: What is the interpretation of salt in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of salt in a dream: It is one of the symbols that can be seen in a dream, and the dreamer cannot know its salty meaning. It carries many signs and signs through which it is possible to know what will happen to the good dreamer. Among the issues related to this symbol, in addition to the opinions and sayings of major scholars and interpreters in the world of dreams, such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi. Interpretation of salt in a dreamSalt is one of the symbols that indicate many signals and signs that can be identified through the following cases: Salt in a dream indicates The blessing of diet and protection from harm that may befall the dreamer. If the dreamer sees white salt in a dream, this symbolizes the great financial gains that he will obtain and will change his life for the better. Interpretation of salt in a dream by Ibn Sirin. One of the most prominent interpreters who dealt with the interpretation of salt in a dream is the scholar Ibn Sirin, Below are some of the interpretations received from him: Salt in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates a lot of money, abundance, and prosperity that the dreamer will enjoy in his life. Seeing salt in a dream indicates asceticism in this world, work in the afterlife, and getting closer to God with good deeds. If the dreamer sees Salt in his dream, it symbolizes his contentment and contentment, which makes him loved by everyone. Salt in Al-Osaimi’s dreamAl-Osaimi is one of the scholars and interpreters who discussed the interpretation of salt in a dream. Among his most important statements and opinions related to this symbol are the following: Al-Osaimi interprets salt in a dream as an indication of the death of worries and sorrows that disturbed his life in the previous period. Seeing salt in a dream indicates the end of disputes, problems, and quarrels that occurred between the dreamer and one of his relatives. Rotten salt in a dream symbolizes Until the dreamer will get sick and need to sleep. Interpretation of salt in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of salt in a dream varies according to the dreamer’s marital status, and the following is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees this symbol: An unmarried girl who sees salt in a dream indicates the purity of her bed, her good morals, and her good reputation. Among people. Seeing salt in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her marriage to someone who may be miserable. Interpretation of a bag of salt in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees a bag of salt in a dream shows her closeness to God and the great position she will occupy in the afterlife. A bag of salt in a dream for a woman An unmarried woman shows her satisfaction with everything God has given her and her perseverance in pleasing Him, praying to Him, and pleading with Him. Interpretation of salt in a dream for a married woman: A married woman in a dream who sees salt in food indicates a lot of money that she will obtain in the coming period. If she sees salt spread on her bed In a dream, this indicates that she will soon become pregnant. Seeing salt in a married woman’s dream indicates the stability of her marital life and the happiness that will dominate her life. Interpretation of salt in a dream for a pregnant woman: During her pregnancy, a woman sees many dreams that contain symbols that are difficult for her to interpret, So we will NF
